import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import com_logo_2 from "../img/com-logo-2.jpg"; export default function FullTimeItem({ id, title, location, salary, nature, dataline, key}) { return (
{title}
{location} Full Time $123 - $456
Apply Now
Date Line: 01 Jan, 2045
); }
